definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put on a hat/to be first/to dub

sentences.english: American kinglet with a notable song and in the male a red crown patch.
sentences.chinese: 以歌唱著名的美洲戴菊鳥，其雄鳥有紅色頭冠。

sentences.english: Her crown, bouquet and necklace were made from caramelized(8) sugar.
sentences.chinese: 新娘的頭冠，花束和項鍊都是用焦糖做的。

sentences.english: We need to find that tiara and get Venus out of there.
sentences.chinese: 我們要找到那頭冠，並帶維納斯離開那裏。

sentences.english: European kinglet with a black-bordered yellow crown patch.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲戴菊鳥，黃色的頭冠上有黑邊點綴。

sentences.english: Some features, like the crest, might have allowed the dinosaur to attract mates.
sentences.chinese: 一些特徵，諸如頭冠羽毛，可能就是用來吸引異性的。

sentences.english: It is like a crown of thorns placed on thy head.
sentences.chinese: 它就像是戴在你頭上的荊棘頭冠。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
item made from woven silk or rayon
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
